snippet.title: Offroad Mechanic Simulator - announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Add Offroad Mechanic Simulator to your #Steam Wishlist:
https://bit.ly/OffroadMechanic

Choose a car. Adjust it. Upgrade it. Take it for a spin.
In this new title from Image Power, you will not only get behind the wheel of powerful off-road vehicles, but you will also be able to customize and upgrade them.  Show your skills and take the challenge. Time to get dirty a little!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ecowarriorsimulator/
WWW: http://imagepower.pl/en/home/
